moviesData.title: The Shawshank Redemption
moviesData.synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

moviesData.title: The Godfather
moviesData.synopsis: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

moviesData.title: Schindler's List
moviesData.synopsis: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

moviesData.title: The Dark Knight
moviesData.synopsis: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham. The Dark Knight must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

moviesData.title: Pulp Fiction
moviesData.synopsis: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

moviesData.title: Fight Club
moviesData.synopsis: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

moviesData.title: The Matrix
moviesData.synopsis: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

moviesData.title: Inception
moviesData.synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

moviesData.title: The Silence of the Lambs
moviesData.synopsis: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

moviesData.title: The Departed
moviesData.synopsis: An undercover cop and a mole in the police force attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

moviesData.title: The Green Mile
moviesData.synopsis: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

moviesData.title: The Revenant
moviesData.synopsis: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

moviesData.title: Parasite
moviesData.synopsis: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

moviesData.title: Interstellar
moviesData.synopsis: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

moviesData.title: Taxi Driver
moviesData.synopsis: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

moviesData.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
moviesData.synopsis: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

moviesData.title: Avengers: Infinity War
moviesData.synopsis: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

moviesData.title: Se7en
moviesData.synopsis: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

moviesData.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
moviesData.synopsis: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

moviesData.title: Masters of the Air
moviesData.synopsis: During World War II, five miles above the ground and behind enemy lines, ten men inside an aluminum bomber known as a "Flying Fortress" battle antiaircraft fire and unrelenting flocks of German fighters.

moviesData.title: Band of Brothers
moviesData.synopsis: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to V-J Day.

moviesData.title: Chernobyl
moviesData.synopsis: In April 1986, the city of Chernobyl in the Soviet Union suffers one of the worst nuclear disasters in the history of mankind. Consequently, many heroes put their lives on the line in the following days, weeks and months.
